item.description:
From boardgamegeek.com:

Prove your knowledge of the second largest, the second farthest, the second fastest, the second of just about everything in this "2nd" trivia game.

Start by choosing a 2nd Guess topic and answer the question immediately for the most points. If you are unsure of the answer, you can ask for a second chance which enables you to choose from 4 multiple choice answers - but you get fewer points and give other players a chance to score as well by second guessing you. Highest score at game's end reigns as 2nd Guess champion - second to none!

Â
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out my house number the day before the event to those who have RSVPed 'Yes'.
item.name: Game Night: 2nd Guess
